title: Hare Krishna Hare Rama
lyrics:
Hare Krishna, Hare Krishna
Krishna Krishna, Hare Hare
Hare Rama, Hare Rama
Rama Rama, Hare Hare

title: Shiva Tandava Stotram
lyrics:
Jatatavigalajjala pravahapavitasthale
Galeavalambya lambitam bhujangatungamalikam
Damaddamaddamaddama ninadavadamarvayam
Chakara chandatandavam tanotu nah shivah shivam

Jata katahasambhrama bhramanilimpanirjhari
Vilolavichivalarai virajamanamurdhani
Dhagadhagadhagajjvalalalata pattapavake
Kishora chandrashekhare ratih pratikshanam mama

Dharadharendranandini vilasabandhubandhura
Sphuradigantasantati pramodamanamanase
Krupakatakshadhorani niruddhadurdharapadi
Kvachidigambare manovinodametuvastuni

Jatabhujangapingala sphuratphanamaniprabha
Kadambakunkumadravapralipta digvadhumukhe
Madandhasindhuraspurattvaguttariyamedure
Manovinodamadbhutam bibhartu bhutabhartari

Sahasralochanaprabhritya sheshalekhashekhara
Prasunadhulidhorani vidhusaranghripithabhuh
Bhujangarajamala nibaddhajatajutaka
Shriyai chiraya jayatam chakorabandhushekharah

Lalata chatvarajvaladhanajnjaya sphulingabha
Nipetapanchasayakam namannilimpanayakam
Sudhamayukhalekhaya virajamanashekharam
Mahakapalisham bhaje vikartanamakhartanam

Trilochaneratimranilokanathakandalam
Milanriparikarmukam prapannabhaktaranakam
Nilimbanetrameduram smarantikantamadvayam
Jagadgurum tamadbhutam bhaje bhavani-mandiram

Maheshvaram makhadhvaram mahavratam mahapadam
Mahakapatamadbhutam manojavapratapakam
Manoharam maharanam mahasurendramardanam
Mahavinashanam bhaje manojavakhilam shivam

Bhasmajabhisannibhama bhaveshaya tamomayam
Namatpakam namaskritam namaskritam namamyaham
Bhavambudhipatataram patanjalipadanvitam
Namami tam vinayakam niramayam haram shivam

Prapanchanasinashanam dhananjayavinashanam
Vishuddhimargagamakam namami tam sadashivam
Shiveti mantramuchcharan shivaya hridi keertitam
Punaḥ punah namamyaham sada shivam sada shivam

title: Hanuman Chalisa
lyrics:
Shri Guru Charan Saroj Raj
Nij Man Mukar Sudhari
Barnau Raghubar Bimal Jasu
Jo Dayaku Phal Chari

Buddhi Hin Tanu Janike
Sumirau Pavan Kumar
Bal Buddhi Vidya Dehu Mohi
Harahu Kalesh Vikaar

Jai Hanuman Gyan Gun Sagar
Jai Kapis Tihun Lok Ujagar
Ramdoot Atulit Bal Dhama
Anjani Putra Pavan Sut Nama

Mahabir Bikram Bajrangi
Kumati Nivar Sumati Ke Sangi
Kanchan Baran Biraj Subesa
Kanan Kundal Kunchit Kesa

Hath Vajra Aur Dhvaja Birajay
Kandhe Moonj Janeu Sajay
Sankar Suvan Kesri Nandan
Tej Pratap Maha Jag Vandan

Vidyavan Guni Ati Chatur
Ram Kaj Karibe Ko Atur
Prabhu Charitra Sunibe Ko Rasiya
Ram Lakhan Sita Man Basiya

Sukshma Roop Dhari Siyahi Dikhava
Vikat Roop Dhari Lank Jarava
Bhima Roop Dhari Asur Sanhare
Ramchandra Ke Kaj Sanvare

Laye Sanjeevan Lakhan Jiyaye
Shri Raghubir Harashi Ur Laye
Raghupati Kinhi Bahut Badai
Tum Mama Priya Bharat Sam Bhai

Sahas Badan Tumharo Jas Gaavein
Asa-Kahi Shripati Kanth Lagaavein
Sankadik Brahmadi Muneesa
Narad Sarad Sahit Aheesa

Yam Kuber Digpal Jahan Te
Kabi Kobid Kahin Sake Kahan Te
Tum Upkar Sugreevahin Keenha
Ram Milaye Rajpad Deenha

Tumharo Mantra Vibheeshan Maana
Lankeshwar Bhaye Sab Jag Jaana
Yug Sahastra Jojan Par Bhaanu
Leelyo Taahi Madhur Phal Jaanu

Prabhu Mudrika Meli Mukha Maahi
Jaladhi Langhi Gaye Achraj Naahi
Durgaam Kaj Jagat Ke Jete
Sugam Anugrah Tumhre Tete

Ram Dware Tum Rakhvare
Hoat Na Aagya Bin Paisare
Sab Sukh Lahen Tumhari Sarna
Tum Rakshak Kaahu Ko Darna

Aapan Tej Samharo Aape
Teenhon Lok Haank Te Kaape
Bhoot Pisach Nikat Nahi Aave
Mahabir Jab Naam Sunave

Naasaye Rog Hare Sab Peera
Japat Nirantar Hanumat Beera
Sankat Te Hanuman Chhudave
Man Karam Vachan Dhyan Jo Lavai

Sab Par Ram Tapasvee Raja
Tin Ke Kaj Sakal Tum Saja
Aur Manorath Jo Koi Lavai
Sohi Amit Jeevan Phal Pavai

Charon Yug Partap Tumhara
Hai Parsiddh Jagat Ujiyara
Sadhu Sant Ke Tum Rakhware
Asur Nikandan Ram Dulare

Ashta Siddhi Nav Nidhi Ke Data
As Bar Din Janki Mata
Ram Rasayan Tumhare Pasa
Sada Raho Raghupati Ke Dasa

Tumhare Bhajan Ram Ko Pavai
Janam Janam Ke Dukh Bisravai
Antkaal Raghubar Pur Jai
Jahan Janam Hari Bhakt Kahai

Aur Devta Chitt Na Dharai
Hanumat Sei Sarva Sukh Karai
Sankat Kate Mite Sab Peera
Jo Sumirai Hanumat Balbeera

Jai Jai Jai Hanuman Gosai
Kripa Karahu Gurudev Ki Naai
Jo Shat Baar Path Kare Koi
Chhutehi Bandi Maha Sukh Hoi

Jo Yah Padhe Hanuman Chalisa
Hoye Siddhi Sakhi Gaureesa
Tulsidas Sada Hari Chera
Keejai Nath Hriday Mah Dera

Pavantanay Sankat Haran
Mangal Murti Roop
Ram Lakhan Sita Sahit
Hriday Basahu Sur Bhoop

title: Om Jai Jagdish Hare
lyrics:
Om Jai Jagdish Hare
Swami Jai Jagdish Hare
Bhakt Jano Ke Sankat
Daas Jano Ke Sankat
Kshat Mein Door Kare
Om Jai Jagdish Hare

Jo Dhyaave Phal Paave
Dukh Vinse Man Ka
Swami Dukh Vinse Man Ka
Sukh Sampatti Ghar Aave
Sukh Sampatti Ghar Aave
Kasht Mite Tan Ka
Om Jai Jagdish Hare

Maat-Pita Tum Mere
Sharan Gahun Mein Kis Ki
Swami Sharan Gahun Mein Kis Ki
Tum Bin Aur Na Dooja
Tum Bin Aur Na Dooja
Aas Karun Mein Jis Ki
Om Jai Jagdish Hare

Tum Pooran Parmatma
Tum Antaryami
Swami Tum Antaryami
Parbrahma Parameshwar
Parbrahma Parameshwar
Tum Sabke Swami
Om Jai Jagdish Hare

Tum Karuna Ke Saagar
Tum Palan Karta
Swami Tum Palan Karta
Main Moorakh Khaal Kaami
Main Sevat Tumko
Swami Sevat Tumko
Mohan Bhav Bharta
Om Jai Jagdish Hare

Tum Ho Ek Agochar
Sabke Praan Pati
Swami Sabke Praan Pati
Kis Vidhi Milun Dayamay
Kis Vidhi Milun Dayamay
Daya Karo Mujh Par
Om Jai Jagdish Hare

Vrat Shubh Fal Paave
Sevat Jo Tumko
Swami Sevat Jo Tumko
Riddhi Siddhi Dhan Aave
Riddhi Siddhi Dhan Aave
Sukh Sampatti Paave
Om Jai Jagdish Hare

Om Jai Jagdish Hare
Swami Jai Jagdish Hare
Bhakt Jano Ke Sankat
Daas Jano Ke Sankat
Kshat Mein Door Kare
Om Jai Jagdish Hare

title: Aigiri Nandini
lyrics:
Aigiri Nandini Nandhitha Medhini
Vishwa Vinodhini Nandanuthe
Girivara Vindhya Shirodhini Vaasini
Vishnuvilaasini Jishnunuthe

Bhagavathi Hey Shithikantha Kutumbini
Bhoorikutumbini Bhoorikrute
Jaya Jaya He Mahishasura Mardhini
Ramya Kapardhini Shailasute

Suravaravarshini Durdharadharshini
Durmukhamarshini Harsharate
Tribhuvanaposhini Shaṅkaratoshini
Kilbishamoshini Ghosharate

Danujaniraśini Dityavaraśini
Durmukhamarshini Harsharate
Jaya Jaya He Mahishasura Mardhini
Ramya Kapardhini Shailasute

Ayi Jagadamba Madamba Kadambavanapriyavaasini Haasa Rate
Shikhari Shironika Shikharivara Gamanapriyachalanalola Rate

Sakala Surasura Devamunīsvara Manavarusura Naikarate
Jaya Jaya He Mahishasura Mardhini
Ramya Kapardhini Shailasute

Ayi Shata Khandavikhandita Runda
Vitundita Shunda Gajadhirute
Ripun’ḍa Vibhedana Maulibhandaka
Randita Shunda Mrigadhirute

Nijabhujadanda Nipatita Khanda
Vipatita Munda Bhatadhirute
Jaya Jaya He Mahishasura Mardhini
Ramya Kapardhini Shailasute

Ayi Raṇadurmadashatruvadhodita
Durdaradharsh'n' Mahāhārate
Tribhuvanapālinee Shoolanidhe
Shoolamane' Bhayadaṅkaraate

Danuja Niraasha Kar'alaya Rava
Tidhumra Vilochana Dhumrate
Jaya Jaya He Mahishasura Mardhini
Ramya Kapardhini Shailasute

Ayi Smaṛatam Rahitaṁ Punaritaraṁ
Amitaksharamimadhi Shaktimate
Tava Padameva Param Padamityanu
Shilayato Mama Kimna Shive

Jaya Jaya He Mahishasura Mardhini
Ramya Kapardhini Shailasute

title: Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva
lyrics:
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva
Mata Jaki Parvati Pita Mahadeva
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva
Mata Jaki Parvati Pita Mahadeva

Ek Dant Dayavant, Char Bhujadhari
Mathe Sindoor Sohat, Muse Ki Savari
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva
Mata Jaki Parvati Pita Mahadeva

Andan Ko Fal Chadhe, Meva Modak Sanga
Ladduan Ka Bhog Lage, Sant Karen Sanga
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva
Mata Jaki Parvati Pita Mahadeva

Dhoop Deep Lawe, Aur Phool Chadhave
Shankh Ghanta Dhwani Se, Sukh Sampatti Paave
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva
Mata Jaki Parvati Pita Mahadeva

Tum Ho Ek Dayaalu, Mein Nirgunyaana
Kripa Karo Maharaj, Ab Mero Kaaj Banaana
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Deva
Mata Jaki Parvati Pita Mahadeva

title: Vaishnav Jan To
lyrics:
Vaishnav jan to tene kahiye
Je peerh paraayi jaaney re
Par dukhe upkar kare toye
Man abhimaan na aaney re

Sakaal lok maan sahune vande
Nindaa na kare keni re
Vaach kaachh man nischal raakhe
Dhan-dhan janani teni re

Samdrishti ne trishna tyagi
Par-stree jene maat re
Jivha thaki asatya na bole
Par-dhan nav jhaley haath re

Moh-maaya vyaape nahi jene
Dridha vairagya jena manma re
Ram naam shoon taaali laagi
Sakal tirth tena tanma re

Vaṇ-lobhinee ne kapat-rahit chhe
Kaam-krodh nivaarya re
Bhane Narsaiyyo tenun darshan karta
Kula ekoter taarya re

title: Shri Ram Chandra Kripalu Bhajman
lyrics:
Shri Ram Chandra Kripalu Bhajman
Harana Bhavabhaya Daarunam
Navakanja Lochan Kanja Mukha
Karakanja Padakanjarunam

Kandarp Aganita Amit Chavi
Navanil Neeraj Sundaram
Patpeet Manahu Tadit Ruchi Shuchi
Naumi Janakisutavaram

Bhaj Dinbandhu Dinesh Danav
Daityavanshnikandanam
Raghunand Anand Kand Kaushal
Chand Dasharath Nandanam

Shri Ram Chandra Kripalu Bhajman
Harana Bhavabhaya Daarunam

Shir Mukut Kundal Tilak Charu
Udaar Ang Vibhushanam
Aajaanubhuja Sharatjan
Sukhdayak Bhakta Poshak Namam

Raghupati Raghav Rajaram
Patit Paavan Sitaram
Bhaj Pyare Tu Sitaram
Bhaj Pyare Tu Hanuman

Shri Ram Chandra Kripalu Bhajman
Harana Bhavabhaya Daarunam

title: Radhe Krishna Radhe Krishna
lyrics:
Radhe Krishna Radhe Krishna
Krishna Krishna Radhe Radhe
Radhe Shyam Radhe Shyam
Shyam Shyam Radhe Radhe
Radhe Govind Radhe Govind
Govind Govind Radhe Radhe
Radhe Gopal Radhe Gopal
Gopal Gopal Radhe Radhe
Radhe Giridhari Radhe Giridhari
Giridhari Giridhari Radhe Radhe
Radhe Damodar Radhe Damodar
Damodar Damodar Radhe Radhe
Radhe Madhav Radhe Madhav
Madhav Madhav Radhe Radhe

title: Om Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya
Shivaya Namah Om
Namah Shivaya

title: Jai Ambe Gauri
lyrics:
Jai Ambe Gauri Maiya
Jai Shyama Gauri
Nishidin Tumko Dhyavat
Har Brahmandeshwari...

title: Shri Krishna Govind Hare Murari
lyrics:
Shri Krishna Govind Hare Murari
Hey Nath Narayan Vasudeva...

title: Saraswati Vandana
lyrics:
Yaa Kundendu Tushaara Haara Dhavalaa
Yaa Shubhra Vastraavritaa
Yaa Veena Varadanda Manditakaraa...

title: Hey Nath Narayan Vasudeva
lyrics:
Hey Nath Narayan Vasudeva
Hari Hari Govind Hare Murari...

title: Shri Ram Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram
lyrics:
Shri Ram Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram
Om Shri Ram Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram...
